snippet: American Pharoah’s intoxicating victories last year have evolved into a mild hangover as the Belmont Stakes is set to go off Saturday without a Triple Crown on the line.
abstract: Horse racing industry, as it prepares for Belmont Stakes, is still basking in afterglow of American Pharoah's Triple Crown win in 2015; is celebrating with increased ticket sales, better television coverage and more traffic at Kentucky Derby Museum and National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah’s intoxicating victories last year have evolved into a mild hangover as the Belmont Stakes is set to go off Saturday without a Triple Crown on the line.

headline.main: No Triple Crown This Year, but an American Pharoah Effect
headline.print_headline: No Triple Crown This Year, but a Triple Crown Effect

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame
